column5: Cozy, convenient, comfortable, home with great access to interstate 35. You can be in downtown Austin in 20 minutes.: Roundrock and Historic Georgetown are minutes away. Shopping, restaurants, and entertainment are all close by. Visit our new brewery, less than 2 miles away. Pflugerville offers something for everyone. Safe, family friendly neighborhood, close to parks and greenbelt walking trails. Private patio oasis in rear for relaxing after day of sightseeing.
